abstractText: This method outlines general considerations and procedures applicable to the collection and processing of representative water grab samples for water quality analysis from surface waters in California by Department of Water Resources using a van Dorn sampler. Grab samples are used to determine the concentration of analytical parameters at a point in time for a given water body. Proper sampling technique is imperative for valid, comparable results.
title: Water sample collection using a van Dorn sampler v1.0
